Class Workbook

  • java.lang.Object
    • picoxlsx4j.Workbook

  • public class Workbook
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a workbook

    • Constructor Detail

      • Workbook

        public Workbook(boolean createWorksheet)
        Default Constructor with additional parameter to create a default worksheet
        Parameters:
        createWorksheet - If true, a default worksheet will be created and set as default worksheet

      • Workbook

        public Workbook(java.lang.String filename,
        java.lang.String sheetName)
         throws WorksheetNameAlreadxExistsException,
                FormatException
        Constructor with filename ant the name of the first worksheet
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename of the workbook
        sheetName - Name of the first worksheet
        Throws:
        WorksheetNameAlreadxExistsException - thrown if the passed worksheet name already exists
        FormatException - Thrown if the worksheet name contains illegal characters

      • addWorksheet

        public void addWorksheet(java.lang.String name)
                  throws WorksheetNameAlreadxExistsException,
                         FormatException
        Adding a new Worksheet
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the new worksheet
        Throws:
        WorksheetNameAlreadxExistsException - Thrown if the name of the worksheet already exists
        FormatException - Thrown if the worksheet name contains illegal characters

      • setCurrentWorksheet

        public Worksheet setCurrentWorksheet(java.lang.String name)
                              throws UnknownWorksheetException
        Sets the current worksheet
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the worksheet
        Returns:
        Returns the current worksheet
        Throws:
        UnknownWorksheetException - Thrown if the name of the worksheet is unknown

      • removeWorksheet

        public void removeWorksheet(java.lang.String name)
                     throws UnknownWorksheetException
        Removes the defined worksheet
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the worksheet
        Throws:
        UnknownWorksheetException - Thrown if the name of the worksheet is unknown

      • addStyle

        public Style addStyle(Style style,
             boolean distinct)
               throws UndefinedStyleException
        Adds a style to the style sheet of the workbook
        Parameters:
        style - Style to add
        distinct - If true, the passed style will be replaced by an identical style if existing. Otherwise an exception will be thrown in case of a duplicate
        Returns:
        Returns the added style. In case of an existing style, the distinct style will be returned
        Throws:
        UndefinedStyleException - Thrown if the style could not be added to the style sheet

      • removeStyle

        public void removeStyle(Style style)
                 throws UndefinedStyleException
        Removes the passed style from the style sheet
        Parameters:
        style - Style to remove
        Throws:
        UndefinedStyleException - Thrown if the style is not defined in the style sheet

      • removeStyle

        public void removeStyle(java.lang.String styleName)
                 throws UndefinedStyleException
        Removes the defined style from the style sheet of the workbook
        Parameters:
        styleName - Name of the style to be removed
        Throws:
        UndefinedStyleException - Thrown if the style is not defined in the style sheet

      • removeStyle

        public void removeStyle(Style style,
               boolean onlyIfUnused)
                 throws UndefinedStyleException
        Removes the defined style from the style sheet of the workbook
        Parameters:
        style - Style to remove
        onlyIfUnused - If true, the style will only be removed if not used in any cell
        Throws:
        UndefinedStyleException - Thrown if the style is not defined in the style sheet

      • removeStyle

        public void removeStyle(java.lang.String styleName,
               boolean onlyIfUnused)
                 throws UndefinedStyleException
        Removes the defined style from the style sheet of the workbook
        Parameters:
        styleName - Name of the style to be removed
        onlyIfUnused - If true, the style will only be removed if not used in any cell
        Throws:
        UndefinedStyleException - Thrown if the style is not defined in the style sheet

      • reorganizeStyles

        public StyleCollection reorganizeStyles()
                                 throws UndefinedStyleException
        Method to prepare the styles before saving the workbook. Don't use the method otherwise,because styles will be reordered and probably removed from the style sheet
        Returns:
        Returns a sorted collection of styles
        Throws:
        UndefinedStyleException - Thrown if an unreferenced style was in the style sheet

      • save

        public void save()
          throws IOException
        Saves the workbook
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws IOException in case of an error

      • saveAs

        public void saveAs(java.lang.String filename)
            throws IOException
        Saves the workbook with the defined name
        Parameters:
        filename - filename of the saved workbook
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown in case of an error
